properties.title: Bikeparcours Schiers
properties.abstract: The 3-kilometre-long bike track in Schiers is permanently accessible to the public and offers a variety of training options for the whole family.
properties.description: The bike track, situated between the parishes of Schiers and Grüsch in the Obere Au region, meanders along the Tersier Stream. The clearly signposted start is located at the bottom of the valley. The terrain allows riders to work on their skills and children to learn their first tricks. It's great for putting your bike through its paces too. A great experience for the whole family.
properties.name: Prättigau Tourismus
